title: AYEE - Online Shopping
description: AYEE is an online shopping platform that allows users to browse and purchase products from various merchants.
details: A comprehensive e-commerce solution engineered to facilitate seamless interactions between merchants and customers. Key features include a robust product catalog with advanced filtering options, a secure shopping cart and checkout process, user authentication and profile management, and a dedicated merchant dashboard for inventory and order management. Built with performance and scalability in mind, utilizing modern web technologies to ensure a responsive and engaging user experience.

title: Portfolio
description: Portfolio is a personal website that showcases my skills and projects.
details: A modern, high-performance personal portfolio website designed to effectively showcase technical skills, professional experience, and project highlights. Features a responsive design, interactive UI elements, and optimized SEO. Implements server-side rendering for fast load times and utilizes a modular component architecture for maintainability. Includes sections for a bio, resume download, project gallery, and contact form, serving as a central hub for professional online presence.

title: SBS Mangaement System
description: SBS Mangaement System is a web application that allows users to manage their school bus services.
details: An integrated management system designed to streamline school bus service operations. Provides tools for route planning, driver and vehicle management, student ridership tracking, and real-time communication. Features a user-friendly interface for administrators to monitor fleet status and generating reports. Enhances operational efficiency and safety compliance through digital record-keeping and automated scheduling capabilities.
